title: Venus Sophia Tea Room and Vegetarian Eatery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Western, Take-out
description: Tearoom offering organic loose leaf teas and organic coffee from around the world. Food menu includes focaccia sandwiches, Italian lasagna and pasta, soup, salads, wraps, Mediterranean tapas, chocolate cake and baked goods. Vegan and gluten free options. Live music on weekends. Afternoon tea service available by reservation.
